Description: A CloudFormation stack which creates a three tier architecture.

Environment.Description: The type of environment which will be created.
Environment.ConstraintDescription: Select an environment of Development, Staging, Production. Default is Development.

VpcCidrBlock.Description: The overall CIDR block used to create the VPC.
VpcCidrBlock.ConstraintDescription: Enter a valid IP CIDR range (e.g. x.x.x.x/x).

PublicCidrBlock1.Description: The CIDR block used to create public subnet 1.
PublicCidrBlock1.ConstraintDescription: Enter a valid IP CIDR range (e.g. x.x.x.x/x).

PublicCidrBlock2.Description: The CIDR block used to create public subnet 2.
PublicCidrBlock2.ConstraintDescription: Enter a valid IP CIDR range (e.g. x.x.x.x/x).

PublicCidrBlock3.Description: The CIDR block used to create public subnet 3.
PublicCidrBlock3.ConstraintDescription: Enter a valid IP CIDR range (e.g. x.x.x.x/x).

PrivateCidrBlock1.Description: The CIDR block used to create private subnet 1.
PrivateCidrBlock1.ConstraintDescription: Enter a valid IP CIDR range (e.g. x.x.x.x/x).

PrivateCidrBlock2.Description: The CIDR block used to create private subnet 2.
PrivateCidrBlock2.ConstraintDescription: Enter a valid IP CIDR range (e.g. x.x.x.x/x).

PrivateCidrBlock3.Description: The CIDR block used to create private subnet 3.
PrivateCidrBlock3.ConstraintDescription: Enter a valid IP CIDR range (e.g. x.x.x.x/x).

DatabaseCidrBlock1.Description: The CIDR block used to create database subnet 1.
DatabaseCidrBlock1.ConstraintDescription: Enter a valid IP CIDR range (e.g. x.x.x.x/x).

DatabaseCidrBlock2.Description: The CIDR block used to create database subnet 2.
DatabaseCidrBlock2.ConstraintDescription: Enter a valid IP CIDR range (e.g. x.x.x.x/x).

DatabaseCidrBlock3.Description: The CIDR block used to create database subnet 3.
DatabaseCidrBlock3.ConstraintDescription: Enter a valid IP CIDR range (e.g. x.x.x.x/x).
